price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߕߏ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߘߴߊ߬ ߛߊ߬ߡߊ߲߬ ߊ߬ ߕߋ߲ߛߌ ߡߊ߬ ( ߕߊߦߌ߲߫ )
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
